DEPARTURE OF DIRECTORS OR CERTAIN OFFICERS; ELECTION OF DIRECTORS; APPOINTMENT OF CERTAIN OFFICERS; COMPENSATORY ARRANGEMENTS OF CERTAIN OFFICERS. On August 21, 2020, Amazon.com, Inc. (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) announced that Jeffrey A. Wilke, CEO Worldwide Consumer, plans to retire from the Company in the first quarter of 2021. Dave Clark, the Company&#8217;s current Senior Vice President, Worldwide Operations, will succeed Mr.&#160;Wilke as CEO Worldwide Consumer. Mr.&#160;Clark joined Amazon in 1999 and has held numerous key roles across Amazon before being named to his current position in January 2013. &#160; ITEM&#160;9.01. FINANCIAL&#160;STATEMENTS AND EXHIBITS. (d) Exhibits. &#160; Exhibit Number &#160;&#160; Description 104 &#160;&#160; The cover page from this Current Report on Form 8-K, formatted in Inline XBRL (included as Exhibit 101). &#160; 3 SIGNATURES Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned hereunto duly authorized. &#160; &#160; &#160; AMAZON.COM, INC.
